00020 
00021 int main(void)
00022 {
00023         long            flags;
00024         t_class         *c;
00025         long            numDataspaces = 0;
00026         t_symbol        **dataspaceNames = NULL;
00027         TTValue         functionNames;
00028         TTSymbol        functionName;
00029         char            dataspaces[2048];
00030         char            functions[2048];
00031         char            tempstr[64];
00032         short           i;
00033 
00034         jamoma_init();
00035         jamoma_getDataspaceList(&numDataspaces, &dataspaceNames);
00036         dataspaces[0] = 0;
00037         for(i=0; i<numDataspaces; i++){
00038                 strcat(dataspaces, dataspaceNames[i]->s_name);
00039                 strcat(dataspaces, " ");
00040         }
00041         FunctionLib::getUnitNames(functionNames);
00042         functions[0] = 0;
00043         for(i=0; i<functionNames.getNumValues(); i++){
00044                 functionNames.get(i, functionName);
00045                 strcat(functions, functionName);        
00046                 strcat(functions, " ");
00047         }
00048 
00049         c = class_new("jcom.paramui",
00050                                   (method)paramui_new,
00051                                   (method)paramui_free,
00052                                   sizeof(t_paramui),
00053                                   (method)NULL,
00054                                   A_GIMME,
00055                                   0L);
00056 
00057         flags = JBOX_TEXTFIELD | JBOX_COLOR;
00058         jbox_initclass(c, flags);
00059         c->c_flags |= CLASS_FLAG_NEWDICTIONARY; // to specify dictionary constructor
00060 
00061         class_addmethod(c, (method)paramui_notify,                      "notify",                       A_CANT, 0);
00062         class_addmethod(c, (method)paramui_paint,                       "paint",                        A_CANT, 0);
00063         class_addmethod(c, (method)paramui_mousedown,           "mousedown",            A_CANT, 0);
00064         class_addmethod(c, (method)paramui_mousedragdelta,      "mousedragdelta",       A_CANT, 0);
00065         class_addmethod(c, (method)paramui_mouseup,                     "mouseup",                      A_CANT, 0);
00066         class_addmethod(c, (method)paramui_oksize,                      "oksize",                       A_CANT, 0);
00067 
00068         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,           "patching_rect",        0, "0. 0. 144. 20.");
00069         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,           "fontname",                     0, JAMOMA_DEFAULT_FONT);
00070         sprintf(tempstr, "%f", JAMOMA_DEFAULT_FONTSIZE);
00071         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,           "fontsize",                     0, tempstr);
00072 
00073         CLASS_STICKY_ATTR(c,            "category",                     0, "Jamoma");
00074         
00075         CLASS_ATTR_SYM(c,                       "name",                         0, t_paramui, attr_name);
00076         CLASS_ATTR_LABEL(c,                     "name",                         0, "Parameter Name");
00077         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,           "name",                         0, "my/parameter");
00078         CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c,                      "name",                         0);
00079         CLASS_ATTR_ACCESSORS(c,         "name",                         paramui_getName, paramui_setName);
00080 
00081         CLASS_ATTR_SYM(c,                       "label",                        0, t_paramui, attr_label);
00082         CLASS_ATTR_LABEL(c,                     "label",                        0, "Parameter Label");
00083         CLASS_ATTR_STYLE(c,                     "label",                        0, "text_onesymbol");
00084         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,           "label",                        0, "");
00085         CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c,                      "label",                        0);
00086 
00087         CLASS_ATTR_SYM(c,                       "type",                         0, t_paramui, attr_type);
00088         CLASS_ATTR_LABEL(c,                     "type",                         0, "Data Type");

00090         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,           "type",                         0, "msg_float");
00091         CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c,                      "type",                         0);
00092         CLASS_ATTR_ACCESSORS(c,         "type",                         paramui_getType, paramui_setType);
00093

00095         CLASS_ATTR_LABEL(c,                     "value/default",        0, "Default Value");

00186 
00187 
00188 t_paramui* paramui_new(t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00189 {
00190         t_paramui               *x = NULL;
00191         t_dictionary    *d = NULL;
00192         long                    flags;
00193         t_atom                  a[LISTSIZE+34];
00194         long                    argLen;
00195         t_max_err               err = MAX_ERR_NONE;
00196 
00197         if(!(d=object_dictionaryarg(argc, argv)))
00198                 return NULL;    
00199 
00200         if(x = (t_paramui*)object_alloc(s_ui_class)){
00201                 flags = 0 
00202                                 | JBOX_DRAWFIRSTIN
00203                                 | JBOX_NODRAWBOX
00204                 //              | JBOX_DRAWINLAST
00205                                 | JBOX_TRANSPARENT      
00206                 //              | JBOX_NOGROW
00207                 //              | JBOX_GROWY
00208                 //              | JBOX_GROWBOTH
00209                 //              | JBOX_IGNORELOCKCLICK
00210                                 | JBOX_HILITE
00211                 //              | JBOX_BACKGROUND
00212                 //              | JBOX_NOFLOATINSPECTOR
00213                                 | JBOX_TEXTFIELD
00214                                 ;
00215 
00216                 jbox_new(&x->box, flags, argc, argv);
00217                 x->box.b_firstin = (t_object *)x;
00218                 x->outlet = outlet_new(x, 0L);
00219                 x->menu_items = NULL;
00220                                 
00221                 attr_dictionary_process(x, d);                                  // handle attribute args
00222                 
00223                 // a textlayout is used for the displaying the value and the unit
00224                 x->layout_value = jtextlayout_create();
00225                 x->layout_unit = jtextlayout_create();
00226 
00227                 jbox_ready(&x->box);
00228 
00229                 x = (t_paramui *)object_register(CLASS_BOX, symbol_unique(), x);
00230                 object_attach_byptr(x, x);                                              // sign up for notifications of changes to our attributes
00231 
00232                 x->menu_items = (t_linklist *)linklist_new();
00233                 paramui_menu_build(x);
00234                 x->menu_qelem = qelem_new(x, (method)paramui_menu_qfn);
00235                 
00236                 // here we create our internal instance of jcom.parameter
00237                 atom_setsym(a+0, x->attr_name);
00238                 atom_setsym(a+1, gensym("@type"));
00239                 atom_setsym(a+2, x->attr_type);
00240                 atom_setsym(a+3, gensym("@ramp/drive"));
00241                 atom_setsym(a+4, x->attr_rampDrive);
00242                 atom_setsym(a+5, gensym("@ramp/function"));
00243                 atom_setsym(a+6, x->attr_rampFunction);
00244                 atom_setsym(a+7, gensym("@ui/freeze"));
00245                 atom_setlong(a+8, x->attr_uiFreeze);
00246                 atom_setsym(a+9, gensym("@value/stepsize"));
00247                 atom_setfloat(a+10, x->attr_stepsize);
00248                 atom_setsym(a+11, gensym("@priority"));
00249                 atom_setlong(a+12, x->attr_priority);
00250                 atom_setsym(a+13, gensym("@range/bounds"));
00251                 atom_setfloat(a+14, x->attr_range[0]);
00252                 atom_setfloat(a+15, x->attr_range[1]);
00253                 atom_setsym(a+16, gensym("@repetitions"));
00254                 atom_setlong(a+17, x->attr_repetitions);
00255                 atom_setsym(a+18, gensym("@range/clipmode"));
00256                 atom_setsym(a+19, x->attr_clipmode);
00257                 atom_setsym(a+20, gensym("@description"));
00258                 atom_setsym(a+21, x->attr_description);
00259                 atom_setsym(a+22, gensym("@dataspace"));
00260                 atom_setsym(a+23, x->attr_dataspace);
00261                 atom_setsym(a+24, gensym("@unit/active"));
00262                 atom_setsym(a+25, x->attr_unitActive);
00263                 atom_setsym(a+26, gensym("@unit/native"));
00264                 atom_setsym(a+27, x->attr_unitNative);
00265                 if(x->attr_defaultSize){
00266                         atom_setsym(a+28, gensym("@value/default"));
00267                         sysmem_copyptr(x->attr_default, a+29, sizeof(t_atom) * x->attr_defaultSize);
00268                         argLen = 29 + x->attr_defaultSize;
00269                 }
00270                 else
00271                         argLen = 28;
00272 
00273                 jcom_core_loadextern(gensym("jcom.parameter"), argLen, a, &x->obj_parameter);
00274                 err = object_attach_byptr(x, x->obj_parameter);
00275                 if(err){
00276                         x->obj_parameter = (t_object*)object_register(CLASS_NOBOX, symbol_unique(), (t_object *)x->obj_parameter);
00277                         err = object_attach_byptr(x, x->obj_parameter);
00278                 }
00279         }
00280         return x;
00281 }
00282 
00283 
00284 void paramui_free(t_paramui *x)
00285 {
00286         jbox_free(&x->box);
00287 
00288         qelem_free(x->menu_qelem);
00289         x->menu_qelem = NULL;
00290         object_free(x->menu_items);
00291         object_detach_byptr(x, x->obj_parameter);
00292         object_detach_byptr(x, x); 
00293         object_unregister(x); 
00294         if(x->layout_value)
00295                 jtextlayout_destroy(x->layout_value);
00296         if(x->layout_unit)
00297                 jtextlayout_destroy(x->layout_unit);
00298         object_free(x->obj_parameter);
00299 }

00301 
00302 #pragma mark -
00303 #pragma mark methods
00304 
00305 void paramui_notify(t_paramui *x, t_symbol *s, t_symbol *msg, void *sender, void *data)
00306 {
00307         if(msg == _sym_modified)
00308                 jbox_redraw(&x->box);   
00309         else if((msg == _sym_attr_modified) && (sender == x)){
00310                 t_object        *textfield;
00311                 t_symbol        *attrname;
00312 
00313                 attrname = (t_symbol *)object_method((t_object *)data, gensym("getname"));
00314                 
00315                 if(attrname == _sym_name){
00316                         if(!x->attr_label || x->attr_label == _sym_nothing){
00317                                 textfield = jbox_get_textfield((t_object*) x); 
00318                                 object_method(textfield, gensym("settext"), x->attr_name->s_name);
00319                         }
00320                 }
00321                 else if(attrname == gensym("label")){
00322                         if(x->attr_label && x->attr_label != _sym_nothing){
00323                                 textfield = jbox_get_textfield((t_object*) x); 
00324                                 object_method(textfield, gensym("settext"), x->attr_label->s_name);
00325                         }
00326                 }
00327                 else
00328                         paramui_menu_build(x);          // we don't really want this everytime -- make this conditional...
00329 
00330                 jbox_redraw(&x->box);
00331         }
00332 }

00335 #pragma mark -
00336 #pragma mark drawing and appearance
00337 
00338 void paramui_paint(t_paramui *x, t_object *view)
00339 {
00340         t_rect          rect;
00341         t_jgraphics *g;
00342         double          middle;
00343         double          border_thickness = 1.5;
00344         double          cornersize = 13.0;
00345 
00346         g = (t_jgraphics*) patcherview_get_jgraphics(view);
00347         jbox_get_rect_for_view((t_object*) &x->box, view, &rect);
00348 
00349         // clear the background
00350         jgraphics_rectangle_rounded(g,  border_thickness, 
00351                                                                         border_thickness, 
00352                                                                         rect.width - (border_thickness * 2.0), 
00353                                                                         rect.height - (border_thickness * 2.0), 
00354                                                                         cornersize, cornersize); 
00355         jgraphics_set_source_rgba(g, 0.1, 0.1, 0.1, 1.0);
00356         jgraphics_fill(g);
00357                 
00358         // draw the inspector icon
00359 
00360                 jgraphics_set_source_rgb(g, 0.2, 0.2, 0.2);
00361                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.5);
00362                 jgraphics_oval(g,       border_thickness,
00363                                                         border_thickness, 
00364                                                         rect.height - (border_thickness * 2.0),
00365                                                         rect.height - (border_thickness * 2.0));
00366                 jgraphics_fill(g);
00367                 
00368                 jgraphics_rectangle_fill_fast(g,        border_thickness + rect.height / 2 - (border_thickness), 
00369                                                                                         border_thickness,
00370                                                                                         border_thickness + rect.height / 2, 
00371                                                                                         rect.height - (border_thickness * 2.0));
00372 
00373                 jgraphics_set_source_rgb(g, 0.4, 0.4, 0.4);
00374                 middle = 6.0;
00375                 jgraphics_move_to(g, 9.5, middle + 4.0);
00376                 jgraphics_line_to(g, 13.0, middle);
00377                 jgraphics_line_to(g, 6.0, middle);
00378                 jgraphics_close_path(g);
00379                 jgraphics_fill(g);
00380 
00381 
00382         if(x->attr_dataspace != ps_none){
00383                 char data[256];
00384 
00385                 // draw the unit display
00386                 jgraphics_set_source_rgb(g, 0.2, 0.2, 0.2);
00387                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.5);
00388                 jgraphics_oval(g,       rect.width - (rect.height - (border_thickness * 2.0)) - 2.0, 
00389                                                         border_thickness, 
00390                                                         rect.height - (border_thickness * 2.0), 
00391                                                         rect.height - (border_thickness * 2.0));
00392                 jgraphics_fill(g);
00393                 
00394                 jgraphics_rectangle_fill_fast(g,        rect.width - ((border_thickness + rect.height / 2 - (border_thickness)) * 3.0) - 2.0, 
00395                                                                                         border_thickness, 
00396                                                                                         border_thickness + rect.height / 1, 
00397                                                                                         rect.height - (border_thickness * 2.0));
00398 
00399                 strcpy(data, "midi");
00400                 jtextlayout_settextcolor(x->layout_unit, &s_light_gray);
00401                 jtextlayout_set(x->layout_unit,
00402                                                 data,
00403                                                 jfont_create(JAMOMA_DEFAULT_FONT, JGRAPHICS_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL, JAMOMA_DEFAULT_FONTSIZE),
00404                                                 rect.width - 28.0, 0.0, 28.0, rect.height,
00405                                                 JGRAPHICS_TEXT_JUSTIFICATION_CENTERED,
00406                                                 JGRAPHICS_TEXTLAYOUT_USEELLIPSIS);
00407                 jtextlayout_draw(x->layout_unit, g);
00408         }
00409 
00410         {
00411                 char    data[256];
00412                 t_atom  *av = NULL;
00413                 long    ac = 0;
00414 
00415                 if(x->obj_parameter){
00416                         object_attr_getvalueof(x->obj_parameter, gensym("value"), &ac, &av);
00417                         if(ac){
00418                                 if(x->attr_type == ps_msg_float)
00419                                         sprintf(data, "%.4f", atom_getfloat(av));
00420                                 else if(x->attr_type == ps_msg_int || x->attr_type == ps_msg_toggle)
00421                                         sprintf(data, "%ld", atom_getlong(av));
00422                                 else if(x->attr_type == ps_msg_symbol)
00423                                         strcpy(data, atom_getsym(av)->s_name);
00424                                 
00425                                 jtextlayout_settextcolor(x->layout_value, &s_light_gray);
00426                                 jtextlayout_set(x->layout_value,
00427                                                                 data,
00428                                                                 jfont_create(JAMOMA_DEFAULT_FONT, JGRAPHICS_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL, JAMOMA_DEFAULT_FONTSIZE),
00429                                                                 84.0, 0.0, rect.width - 84.0 - 20.0, rect.height,
00430                                                                 JGRAPHICS_TEXT_JUSTIFICATION_LEFT,
00431                                                                 JGRAPHICS_TEXTLAYOUT_USEELLIPSIS);
00432                                 jtextlayout_draw(x->layout_value, g);
00433                                 sysmem_freeptr(av);
00434                         }
00435                 }
00436         }
00437 
00438         // draw borders
00439         jgraphics_rectangle_rounded(g,  border_thickness, 
00440                                                                         border_thickness, 
00441                                                                         rect.width - (border_thickness * 2.0), 
00442                                                                         rect.height - (border_thickness * 2.0), 
00443                                                                         cornersize, cornersize); 
00444         jgraphics_set_source_rgb(g, 0.3, 0.3, 0.3);
00445         jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.5);
00446         jgraphics_stroke(g);
00447 
00448         jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.0);
00449         jgraphics_move_to(g, border_thickness, 19.5);
00450         jgraphics_line_to(g, rect.width - (border_thickness * 1.0), 19.5);
00451         jgraphics_stroke(g);
00452 }

00454 
00455 void paramui_mousedown(t_paramui *x, t_object *patcherview, t_pt px, long modifiers)
00456 {
00457         t_rect rect;
00458         
00459         jbox_get_rect_for_view((t_object *)x, patcherview, &rect); 
00460         if(px.x < 14)
00461                 paramui_menu_do(x, patcherview, px, modifiers);
00462 }

00478 
00479 #pragma mark -
00480 #pragma mark Menus
00481 
00482 void paramui_menu_do(t_paramui *x, t_object *patcherview, t_pt px, long modifiers)
00483 {
00484         t_jpopupmenu            *p;
00485         t_symobject                     *item;
00486         long                            size, i;
00487         int                             selectedId;
00488         t_jfont                         *font;
00489         int                                     coord_x=0, coord_y=0;
00490         t_pt                            pt;
00491 
00492         jbox_set_mousedragdelta((t_object *)x, 0);
00493         p = jpopupmenu_create();
00494 
00495         font = jfont_create(JAMOMA_MENU_FONT,
00496                                                 JGRAPHICS_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL,
00497                                                 JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL,
00498                                                 JAMOMA_MENU_FONTSIZE);
00499         jpopupmenu_setfont(p, font);
00500         jfont_destroy(font);
00501         size = linklist_getsize(x->menu_items);
00502         for(i=0; i<size; i++){
00503                 item = (t_symobject *)linklist_getindex(x->menu_items, i);
00504                 if(!item->sym || (item->sym->s_name[0] == '\0') || item->sym->s_name[0] == '-')//{
00505                         jpopupmenu_addseperator(p);
00506                 else
00507                         jpopupmenu_additem(p, i+1, item->sym->s_name, NULL, 0, item->flags, NULL);
00508         }
00509 
00510         object_method(patcherview, gensym("canvastoscreen"), 0.0, 0.0, &coord_x, &coord_y);     
00511         coord_x += x->box.b_patching_rect.x;
00512         coord_y += x->box.b_patching_rect.y;
00513         pt.x = coord_x;
00514         pt.y = coord_y;
00515         selectedId = jpopupmenu_popup_nearbox(p, (t_object*)x, patcherview, x->menu_selection+1); 
00516         if(selectedId){
00517                 x->menu_selection = selectedId -1;
00518                 qelem_set(x->menu_qelem);
00519         }
00520 
00521         jpopupmenu_destroy(p);
00522 }
00523 
00524 
00525 void paramui_menu_qfn(t_paramui *x)
00526 {
00527         t_symobject *item = (t_symobject *)linklist_getindex(x->menu_items, x->menu_selection);
00528         
00529         if(item->sym == gensym("Set Parameter to Default Value"))
00530                 object_method(x->obj_parameter, gensym("reset"));
00531 }
00532 
00533 
00534 void paramui_menu_build(t_paramui *x)
00535 {
00536         t_symobject     *item = NULL;
00537         
00538         if(!x->menu_items)
00539                 return;
00540 
00541         linklist_clear(x->menu_items);
00542         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(x->attr_name);
00543         item->flags = 1;
00544         linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00545         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("-"));
00546         linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00547         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Refresh Display of This Parameter"));
00548         linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00549         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Set Parameter to Default Value"));
00550         linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00551         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Edit Parameter Attributes"));
00552         linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00553 }
00554 
00555 
00556 void* paramui_oksize(t_paramui *x, t_rect *rect)
00557 {
00558         t_object        *textfield = NULL;
00559                 
00560         // We do textfield configuration here because the margins are dependent upon the dimensions
00561         // textfield is used for displaying the parameter name
00562         textfield = jbox_get_textfield((t_object*) x); 
00563         textfield_set_noactivate(textfield, 1);
00564         textfield_set_readonly(textfield, 1);
00565         textfield_set_editonclick(textfield, 0);
00566         textfield_set_wordwrap(textfield, 0);
00567         textfield_set_useellipsis(textfield, 1); 
00568         textfield_set_textcolor(textfield, &s_light_gray);
00569         textfield_set_textmargins(textfield, 18.0, 2.5, rect->width - 80.0, 1.5);
00570         
00571         return (void *)1;
00572 }
